metadata.synopsis: Default Dialogs for Baldur's Mouth Guard 04
metadata.how_to_trigger: Talk to the guards in the Writing Room

0.speaker: Guard Inocente Bramm
0.text: Look mate, could you shove off? We're expecting a new ink shipment soon.

1.speaker: Guard Inocente Bramm
1.text: You know what? I'm glad they posted me out here. Those writers were starting to piss me off - all the incessant, inane chatter.
